ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 - SIM 1 & SIM 2 (Dual Standby)
Facebook Launcher; Full QWERTY Keypad; Large 2″ Color LCD; Java Lite
VGA Camera; Bluetooth; MP3 and MP4 Player; FM Radio
microSD card slot for expandable memory; FCC Certified
ProductInfo.Name: Social Breeze FB101 Unlocked GSM Phone with Dual SIM, QWERTY Keypad, Camera, Facebook Launcher, Bluetooth, FM Radio, MP3/MP4 Player and microSD Slot - Black
